commit.message: Updated tests and fixed inconsistent message on assert_eq

+// error-pattern:assertion failed: `(left != right)`
+// error-pattern: left: `14`
+// error-pattern:right: `14`
+
+fn main() {
+    assert_ne!(14, 14);
+}
